name: Microsoft Flight Simulator (v4.0)
overview: Version 4 of Flight Simulator was released just 15 months after version 3. The changes include: Makeshift airplane designer, which allowed for wing adjustments and weight, speed, and color changes. New aircraft: Sailplane Random weather patterns Dynamic scenery (e.g. air traffic) Like the previous release, version 4 included scenery for five cities (New York, Seattle, San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Chicago).
